view.title: LLM
view.help: This view uses an LLM to generate a data management plan.
view.title: LLM
view.help: Diese Ansicht nutzt in LLM um einen Datenmanagementplan zu erzeugen.
view.template:
{% load view_tags %} {% load llm_tags %}

LLM View

{% llm prompt="Use only h2 and h3." %} ## 1. Data Summary ### Purpose of data collection ### Type and format of data ### Estimated volume ### Data origin ## 2. Standards and Metadata ### Metadata standards ### Documentation practices ### File naming and versioning conventions ## 3. Data Storage and Backup ### Active storage environment ### Backup strategy ### Security measures ## 4. Ethical, Legal, and Security Considerations ### Data sensitivity ### Informed consent and anonymization ### Compliance ## 5. Data Sharing and Access ### Sharing strategy ### Repositories ### Licensing ### Access control ## 6. Responsibilities and Resources ### Roles and responsibilities ### Expertise and training ### Budget ## 7. Data Preservation and Long-Term Archiving ### What will be preserved ### Duration ### Archiving solution ### Format sustainability ## 8. Quality Assurance ### Data quality checks ### Workflow transparency ### Change tracking {% endllm %}
